alfredsnippet.snippet:
"I have tried in this book to select anomalies and innovations found before the turn of the twentieth century, in the hope of bringing respect and admiration to the spirit of inquiry in those earlier times. We have much to relearn and reincorporate into our own time. We must blend it with the best of what we now have to offer."

- R.A. Ford, Homemade Lightning
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Spirit of Inquiry in Earlier Times
